views module¶

views.add_camp(request)[source]¶

Add a campaign for student Return django.shortcuts.redirect with all_camps

views.add_comp(request)[source]¶

Add a complaint for student Return django.shortcuts.redirect with comp

views.add_dish(request)[source]¶

Loads page to add dish form for admin Return django.shortcuts.render with Additem.html

views.add_item(request)[source]¶

Add new dish to DB, as received in POST reques Return django.shortcuts.redirect with viewdish

views.add_waste(request)[source]¶

Add a wastage report for the day Return django.shortcuts.redirect with view_waste

views.admin_comp(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view complaints for admin Return django.shortcuts.render object with admin_comp.html

views.admin_comp_detail(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view complain details for admin Return django.shortcuts.render object with comp_detail_admin.html

views.admin_nav(request)[source]¶

Loads nav bar for admin Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse with output

views.admin_view_comp(request)[source]¶

Sends all student complaint details for admin to view in tabular form Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse object with results

views.adminhome(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view Admin’s home page Return django.shortcuts.render object with admin.html

views.adminlog(request)[source]¶

Loads Page for admin login Return django.shortcuts.render object with adminlog.html

views.all_camps(request)[source]¶

Loads page for students to view all campaigns Return django.shortcuts.render with campaigns.html

views.all_camps_admin(request)[source]¶

Loads page for admin to view all campaigns Return django.shortcuts.render with campaigns_admin.html

views.comp(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view complaint for students Return django.shortcuts.render object with view_comp.html

views.comp_detail(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view complain details for students Return django.shortcuts.render object with comp_detail_stu.html

views.confirm(request)[source]¶

Verify Students Email from link sent to IITB mail Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse object with result

views.delete_dish(request)[source]¶

Deletes a dish as requested by Admin Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse with response

views.dish_load(request)[source]¶

Loads all dishes for admin in tabular form Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse with results

views.dishs(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view all dishes for students Return django.shortcuts.render object with dish.html

views.edit_dish(request)[source]¶

Edits dish as recived from POST request Return django.shortcuts.render with edit_dish.html

views.edit_item(request)[source]¶

Updates a dish as recived in POST request Return django.shortcuts.redirect with viewdish

views.home(request)[source]¶

Loads student home page with all dishes Return django.shortcuts.render with home.html

views.load_waste(request)[source]¶

Sends all wastage details between from and to dates recevied in POST request to view in tabular form Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse object with results

views.log_admin(request)[source]¶

Verifies Admin’s Credentials Return django.shortcuts.redirect object with /adminhome if success

views.log_ver(request)[source]¶

Verify Students Credentials Return django.shortcuts.redirect object with /home if success

views.login(request)[source]¶

Loads Page for student login Return django.shortcuts.render object with index.html

views.logout_admin(request)[source]¶

Deletes Session for Admin Return django.shortcuts.redirect object with /adminhome

views.logout_stu(request)[source]¶

Deletes Session for Student Return django.shortcuts.redirect object with login

views.post_review(request)[source]¶

Adds review to a dish for student Return django.shortcuts.redirect with /dish

views.raise_camp(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view form to raise campaign details for students Return django.shortcuts.render object with new_camp.html

views.raise_comp(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view form to raise complaint details for students Return django.shortcuts.render object with complain.html

views.reg(request)[source]¶

Registers student to the portal and sends confirmation email to their emails. Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse

views.register(request)[source]¶

Loads Page for student register Return django.shortcuts.render object with register.html

views.show_comp(request)[source]¶

Sends Complaint details for students and admin Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse with output

views.show_dish(request)[source]¶

Sends details for a dish id received in a POST request Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse object with results

views.show_review(request)[source]¶

Loads all reviews for a dish id, from GET request Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse with results

views.stu_waste(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view wastage for students Return django.shortcuts.render object with stu_waste.html

views.student_load(request)[source]¶

Sends all student details for admin to view in tabular form Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse object with results

views.student_nav(request)[source]¶

Loads nav bar for student Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse with output

views.verify(request)[source]¶

Student Verification confirmation done by Admin Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse with response

views.view_comp(request)[source]¶

Sends student’s complaint details to view in tabular form Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse object with results

views.view_waste(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view wastage for Admin Return django.shortcuts.render object with waste_food.html

views.viewdish(request)[source]¶

Loads Page to view dishes table for admin Return django.shortcuts.render object with viewdish.html

views.vote(request)[source]¶

Updates student’s choice of up/down voting Campaigns Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse

views.vote_admin(request)[source]¶

Updates Admin’s choice of accepting/rejecting Campaigns Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse

views.vote_page(request)[source]¶

Sends all campaign details to student along with choice to up/down vote campaigns Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse with response

views.vote_page_admin(request)[source]¶

Sends all campaign details to admin along with choice to accept reject campaigns Return django.shortcuts.HttpResponse with response
